short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert 6x more candidates in half the time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to manual profile sorting and complex searches. Hyperscan reviews each profile just as you would, pinpointing your best matches in a flash. Replace generic job descriptions with individual job microsites. Join other high-volume recruitment teams who have saved hours on every project.

This extension will supercharge your sourcing efforts as now you will be able to add your LinkedIn candidates to Hyperscan system directly with a single click!
